Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1973...
Injured on 4/8/1973 with a Fractured Knee, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1977 with a Broken Foot, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/7/1979, off Dennis Eckersley (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1979, off Jon Matlack (CHC)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1981...
Injured on 6/17/1982 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1983, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
